Streamline your risk and compliance workflows with the official Parakeet extension for Chrome. This powerful tool helps compliance professionals and risk managers save time and stay informed by seamlessly integrating web content with their Parakeet Risk & Compliance platform.

Key Features:

Extract Compliance Findings: Quickly capture and document compliance-related information from any webpage directly into your Parakeet system. Perfect for audit trails, regulatory updates, and compliance documentation.

Smart Article Indexing: Save and categorize relevant articles, regulatory updates, and industry news within your Parakeet knowledge base. Keep your compliance library organized and accessible.

RSS Feed Integration: Subscribe to important regulatory feeds, industry news sources, and compliance updates directly from your browser. Stay informed about changes that could impact your compliance status.

Perfect for:

Compliance Officers

Risk Managers

Quality Assurance Teams

Regulatory Affairs Professionals

Operations Managers in goods-producing companies

This extension serves as your direct connection between the web and your Parakeet platform, eliminating manual data entry and helping you maintain a comprehensive compliance management system.

Save time, reduce errors, and strengthen your compliance program with the Parakeet Chrome extension â€“ your essential companion for modern risk and compliance management.

Privacy & Security:

The extension only accesses webpage content when explicitly activated by the user and operates within your existing Parakeet security framework.
